content: In the end, I used all that treasure to buy all sorts of car parts and Soda Pop-Pops! Swoosh~! Wanna try one?

content: {A点头}Glenn might be small in stature, but he takes his shop very seriously and is very attentive to everyone's needs. He even stocks up on different designs for trivial things like cushions.
info: 第四瓶露卡_艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A想象}Have you ever experienced the rush of discovering hidden treasure? When you've overcome danger, crossed mountains and seas, and you finally lay your eyes on your prize at the end... A shiny, glowing treasure chest!

content: {A灵光一现}Quick, give the new <style=Highlight>Luca</style> a try! I really wanna know what cool stuff might pop up if the planet keeps growing!

content: I do like to tease him, but I actually really respect how hard he works and how detail-oriented he is!

content: But all those shiny gems and jewels are useless to me, so... I sold them all to Glenn.
